title: The PrescIT platform: An interoperable Clinical Decision Support System for ePrescription to Prevent Adverse Drug Reactions and Drug-Drug Interactions
details: P Natsiavas, G Nikolaidis, J Pliatsika, A Chytas… - Drug Safety, 2024
abstract: Objectives The PrescIT platform is a Clinical Decision Support System (CDSS) that aims to facilitate the prevention of adverse drug reactions (ADRs) and drug-drug interactions (DDIs) in the phase of ePrescription in Greece. The proposed platform …
